_source.text: 1147 The queen of the south shall rise in the judgement with the people of this generation, and condemn  1148 them:  for she came from the ends of the earth that she might hear the wisdom of Solomon; [6] [Arabic, p. 62] and behold, here is a better than Solomon.

text: **1147** The queen of the south shall rise in the judgement with the people of this generation, and condemn  **1148** them:  for she came from the **ends** of the earth that she might hear the wisdom of Solomon; [6] [Arabic, p. 62] and behold, here is a **better** **than** Solomon.
